title: Tom Brady dismissed ‘paranoid and distrustful’ accusations over Raiders conflict of interest

title: ‘A very disturbed mind’: Fairhaven man sentenced for assaulting girls with wife, including his daughter

title: Boston police: Naked man carrying ‘large knife’ shot by officers after Beacon Hill break-in
author: Abby Patkin

The scene on Mount Vernon Street Wednesday morning.

Truman Dickerson for The Boston Globe By Abby Patkin September 24, 2025 | 9:38 AM 1 minute to read A naked man allegedly wielding a large knife was shot by Boston police officers responding to a reported break-in in Beacon Hill Wednesday, authorities confirmed.
